definition: strong/powerful/better/slightly more than/vigorous/violent/best in their category, e.g. see 百強|百强[bai3 qiang2]
to force/to compel/to strive/to make an effort
Zhuang ethnic group of Guangxi, the PRC's second most numerous ethnic group

sentences.english: We need a strong farm hand.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要一个强壮的田间能手。

sentences.english: But you do need to hit every single shot with your arm.
sentences.chinese: 因此，你必须需要一个强壮的手臂来击打每一个回球。

sentences.english: He is so strong that he can lift the stone .
sentences.chinese: 他如此的强壮，以致于可以举起这块石头。

sentences.english: Dwarven women are sturdy and nearly as tough as their men folk.
sentences.chinese: 矮人女子几乎和他们的男性一样强壮。

sentences.english: It's clear the Chukchi were much more aggressive and stronger.
sentences.chinese: 很明显楚克其族人更具攻击性，更强壮。

sentences.english: She ups with her brawny arm.
sentences.chinese: 她举起了自己强壮的手臂。

sentences.english: His shoulders were broad and strong, his hands were very strong.
sentences.chinese: 他有宽大强壮的肩膊，两只有力的手。

sentences.english: Most strong-bodied man as he is, he can't move the big stone.
sentences.chinese: 他虽然是最强壮的，但他也搬不动那块大石头。

sentences.english: The glory of youths is their strength, but the beauty of the aged is their gray hair.
sentences.chinese: 强壮乃少年人的荣耀，白发为老年人的尊容。

sentences.english: He likes sports very much, so he looks strong and young.
sentences.chinese: 他特别喜欢体育，所以看起采既年轻又强壮。

sentences.english: 'I like a man that is buff, and you're just my type. '
sentences.chinese: 我很喜欢强壮的男子，而你就是我喜欢的那一型。

sentences.english: Its legs are short and strong with hard hairs.
sentences.chinese: 它的腿又短又强壮，并长有硬毛。

sentences.english: You look really buff and no more beer belly.
sentences.chinese: 你看起来真的强壮了，而且没有啤酒肚。

sentences.english: He is strong, brave and, above all honest.
sentences.chinese: 他强壮，威猛，最重要的是他很诚实。

sentences.english: He is a stout man, red of face.
sentences.chinese: 他是脸色红润，非常强壮。

sentences.english: Serious surfers are much stronger and thinner than beach boys.
sentences.chinese: 冲浪运动员要比沙滩小伙儿强壮得多，瘦得多。
